sentences.chinese: 十六年，晉文公敗楚師于城濮。
sentences.literal: In the sixteenth year, Duke Wen of Jin defeated Chu troops at Cheng Pu.
sentences.idiomatic: In the sixteenth year, Duke Wen of Jin defeated Chu's army at Cheng Pu.

sentences.chinese: 是歲，穆公卒，子共公朔立。
sentences.literal: In this year, Duke Mu died, and his son Duke Gong Shuo ascended.
sentences.idiomatic: That year, Duke Mu died; his son Duke Gong Shuo ascended.

sentences.chinese: 共公六年，楚太子商臣弒其父成王代立，是為穆王。
sentences.literal: In Duke Gong's sixth year, Chu's Crown Prince Shang Chen assassinated his father King Cheng and replaced him, becoming King Mu.
sentences.idiomatic: In Duke Gong's sixth year, Chu's Crown Prince Shang Chen assassinated his father King Cheng and took his place; this was King Mu.

sentences.literal: In the eleventh year, Duke Mu of Qin died.
sentences.idiomatic: In the eleventh year, Duke Mu of Qin died.

sentences.chinese: 十八年，共公卒，子靈公平國立。
sentences.literal: In the eighteenth year, Duke Gong died, and his son Duke Ling Ping Guo ascended.
sentences.idiomatic: In the eighteenth year, Duke Gong died; his son Duke Ling Ping Guo ascended.

sentences.literal: In Duke Ling's first year, King Zhuang of Chu ascended the throne.
sentences.idiomatic: In Duke Ling's first year, King Zhuang of Chu ascended the throne.

sentences.literal: In the sixth year, Chu attacked Chen.
sentences.idiomatic: In the sixth year, Chu attacked Chen.

sentences.literal: In the tenth year, Chen and Chu made peace.

sentences.chinese: 十四年，靈公與其大夫孔寧、儀行父皆通於夏姬，衷其衣以戲於朝。
sentences.literal: In the fourteenth year, Duke Ling and his grand officers Kong Ning and Yi Xing Fu all had relations with Xia Ji. They wore her undergarments to play in court.

sentences.chinese: 靈公以告二子，二子請殺泄冶，公弗禁，遂殺泄冶。
sentences.literal: Duke Ling told his two sons. The two sons requested to kill Xie Ye. The duke did not forbid it, so they killed Xie Ye.

sentences.chinese: 十五年，靈公與二子飲於夏氏。
sentences.literal: In the fifteenth year, Duke Ling drank with his two sons at the Xia clan.

sentences.chinese: 靈公罷酒出，徵舒伏弩廏門射殺靈公。
sentences.literal: Duke Ling stopped drinking and went out. Xia Zheng Shu hid a crossbow at the stable gate and shot Duke Ling to death.

sentences.chinese: 孔寧、儀行父皆奔楚，靈公太子午奔晉。
sentences.literal: Kong Ning and Yi Xing Fu all fled to Chu. Duke Ling's crown prince Wu fled to Jin.
Xia Zheng Shu established himself as Duke of Chen.
